org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks

Interface TaskSystemFactoryMakerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskSystemFactoryMaker

    public interface TaskSystemFactoryMakerService

    Provides an interface for a TaskSystemFactoryMaker service. The purpose of this interface is to expose an implementation of a TaskSystemFactoryMaker as an OSGi service.

    To comply with this interface, an implementation must be thread safe and address both the possibility that only a single instance is created and used throughout and that new instances are created as desired.

      • getFactory

        TaskSystemFactory getFactory(java.lang.String inputFormat,
                             java.lang.String outputFormat,
                             java.lang.String locale)
                      throws TaskSystemFactoryException
        Gets a TaskSystemFactory that supports the specified locale and format.
        Parameters:
        inputFormat - the input file format
        outputFormat - the output file format
        locale - the target locale
        Returns:
        returns a task system factory for the specified locale and format
        Throws:
        TaskSystemFactoryException - if a factory cannot be returned
